channel.title: Nuclear industry on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Nuclear industry on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Areva Logo
Areva S.A. was a French multinational group specializing in nuclear power and renewable energy headquartered in Paris, France. Before its 2016 corporate restructuring, Areva was majority-owned by the French state through the French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission, Banque publique d’investissement, and Agence des participations de l’État. Électricité de France, of which the French government has a majority ownership stake, owned 2.24%; Kuwait Investment Authority owned 4.82% as the second largest shareholder after the French state.
You can download theArevalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Areva
item.description: Areva S.A. was a French multinational group specializing in nuclear power and renewable energy headquartered in Paris, France. Before its 2016 corporate restructuring, Areva was majority-owned by the French state through the French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission, Banque publique d’investissement, and Agence des participations de l’État. Électricité de France, of which the French government has a majority ownership stake, owned 2.24%; Kuwait Investment Authority owned 4.82% as the second largest shareholder after the French state.
